TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmSchemaAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Attribute that indicates that the assembly contains classes that are mapped to entity types in a conceptual model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This attribute is applied to an assembly that contains entity types. It is only required to be applied once, but it may be applied multiple times. When it is applied multiple times to a single assembly in a Visual Basic project, the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmSchemaAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor must be used to supply a GUID string value that is unique for each conceptual model referenced by the assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string assemblyGuid) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that is a unique GUID value for the model in the assembly.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a unique value for each model referenced by the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this constructor to supply a GUID string value that is unique for each conceptual model referenced by the same assembly. Do this when <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmSchemaAttribute> is applied multiple times to a single assembly in a Visual Basic project.
